segments.text: Excuse me , sir , I'm afraid you can't park your car here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ? It's my parking space .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ? That's a surprise . Let me see ... D 0411 Our dog's birthday . Yes , I'm sure this my parking space !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I saw a red car always parking here before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , we've just repainted our car . It was red .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe . But the car of this space has a broken rearview mirror on the left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . It used to . We got that fixed yesterday too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you wait for a minute , sir ? I'd like to have a check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir , my mistake . This is your parking space .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right . It's not your fault .
segments.speaker: S2
